tabs.title: Bookmarks
tabs.help:
A Treeview of all the bookmarks, with full text search.
Note: You select the Quicklinks from here by right clicking the folder you want to get your quicklinks from.
Click edit button to get bookmark editor.

tabs.title: Quicklinks
tabs.help:
A list of links chosen by the user. The links are chosen by right clicking a folder in the bookmark tree.
Note: You can only select one folder and only the bookmarks directly in that folder are shown, not in sub folders.

tabs.title: Closed
tabs.help:
Recently closed tabs.
Note: Is cleared by chrome each time browser is closed.

tabs.title: Apps
tabs.help:
A list of chrome apps presently installed in the browser.
Note: only apps with a page are listed.

tabs.title: Closed
tabs.help:
Recently closed tabs.
Note: Is cleared by chrome each time browser is closed.

tabs.title: Apps
tabs.help:
A list of chrome apps presently installed in the browser.
Note: only apps with a page are listed.
